name: BSD 360 Portfolio (Legacy)
description:
Note: this is a legacy project showing older technology

This project showcases the capabilities of using 360 photos for creating immersive learning experiences. This project shows images taken during several projects and shows how they can be tied together using hotspots.

There are 3 versions of the app here, Windowsm Mac, and Oculus (Windows). For the Oculus version you will need a VR headset to view.
